shuddha wu bayibalaya: yeramiya - parichchedaya 13 swaminwahanse mata kathakota: numbaa gos hana patiyak miletagena numbae ingatiyehi bandaganna, eeka wathure nodamannayi kiseka. 2 mamada swanwahansege wachanaya lesa patiyak miletagena mage ingatiyehi bandagaththemi. 3 deweni wara swaminwahansege wachanaya ma wethata pamina: 4 numbaa miletagaththawu numbae ingatiyehi thibena patiya aragena pitathwi, prath gangawa langata gos ehi parwathaye wiwarayaka eeka sangawa thabannayi kiya. 5 mamada swaminwahanse mata anakala lesa gos prath gangawa langa eeka sangawa thabimi. 6 boho dawasakata pasu swaminwahanse mata kathakota: numbaa pitathwi prath gangawa langata gos, ehi sangawa thabanta ma wisin numbaata anakala patiya ethanin gannayi kiseka. 7 mamada prath gangawa langata gos, hara, ma wisin patiya sangawa thabu thanin eeka gathimi.
sumali dannawada ara sarath mahaththaya yawwe kawuda kiyala..

meyata sahabhagiwimen adala aayathanawalata thamange paribhogikayan sandaha pirisidu, saukhyarakshitha saha rasawath aahara sapayimata puluwan wima, emagin paribhogikayan aakarshanaya karagatha hakiwima, apirisidu aahara sapayime chodana yatathe nithiyen danduwam labime saha aayathana wasa damime awadhanamen midimata puluwanwima, sama anshayakama mana paripalanayakata hurupuruduwima, labha wadikara ganimata puluwan wima, thama aayathanaye pramithiya sambandhawa samaja piliganimak saha prasiddhiyak labaganimata puluwanwima yanadi wasi prayojana athwe.
yamkisi rajayak pilibandawa ee rate janathawage wishwasaya nathnam ee awishwasaye wasaya karanne thrasthawadiya.
ehi jiwath wunu minisun gana owun kala ki da gana boho padam apata kiyadeyi.

eyarpot and eewiyeshan sarwisas (shri lanka) limitad aayathanaya rupiyal miliyana 10k, rajaye niladharinge yaha sadhaka sangamaya saha irigeshan injiniyarin diplomats asosiyeshan aayathanaya rupiyal miliyanaya bagin da, kaluthara bodhi bharakara mandalaya rupiyal miliyana 10k, mano sekaram mahatha rupiyal miliyana 05k, wishwawidyala widhayaka niladharinge sangamaya rupiyal miliyana 2.5k shri lanka aagamana ha wigamana niladharinge sangamaya rupiyal panlaksha panasdahasak, rajya mudal departhamenthuwa rupiyal eklaksha wisi pandahasak saha jathika tharuna sewa sabhawa miliyana 1.5k washayen wu parithyaga adhyaksha janaral (palana) wishramika mejar janaral ke.bi. egodawele mahathata bhara di thibe.
